lead_paragraph: The question surrounding Eritrea’s World Cup qualifier Tuesday at Rwanda is not how many goals the visitors will score, but how many players will be on the plane flight home.
snippet: The question surrounding Eritrea’s World Cup qualifier Tuesday at Rwanda is not how many goals the visitors will score, but how many players will be on the plane flight home.
